author: CBNNews.com
title: Your $10 Bill May Be Getting a Facelift, Literally - Finance - CBN News - Christian News 24-7 - CBN.com
text:
Earlier this year, President Barack Obama announced plans to put a woman on the bill, and it's causing some controversy.
A non-profit called Women on the 20s says the $10 bill is not enough. It wants a woman on the $20 bill instead.
The group's online campaign has more than half a million signatures.
Treasury Secretary Jack Lew is open to suggestions about who should be on the currency, but he's sticking to the $10.
The debate has put a group called MRC-TV on a quest to see how many Americans actually know whose image is on American money.
What they found is quite funny. You can watch the full video below:
